templates.name: 经典全家福
templates.prompt: Classic family portrait, all family members standing in traditional arrangement, facing camera, formal attire, elegant pose
templates.scene: formal living room or studio with classic backdrop
templates.attire: coordinated formal family attire: family members wearing formal or semi-formal clothing, suits, dresses, or elegant outfits that match in color palette or style

templates.name: 温馨家庭聚会
templates.prompt: Casual family photo, relaxed postures, natural expressions, comfortable clothing, authentic family moment
templates.scene: cozy living room, family room, or comfortable home setting
templates.attire: coordinated casual family attire: family members wearing comfortable casual clothing, casual shirts, sweaters, or relaxed outfits that look natural and cozy together

templates.name: 户外家庭照
templates.prompt: Family photo outdoors, natural setting, casual clothing, relaxed poses, natural sunlight
templates.attire: outdoor-appropriate family attire: family members wearing clothing suitable for outdoor activities, casual wear, light jackets, or comfortable outdoor outfits

templates.name: 多代同堂
templates.prompt: Multigenerational family portrait with grandparents, parents, and children, warm family bonds visible
templates.attire: respectful multi-generational attire: formal or semi-formal clothing appropriate for all ages, traditional or classic styles that show respect for family traditions

templates.name: 活泼家庭照
templates.prompt: Playful family photo, fun poses, laughing expressions, dynamic composition, family having fun together
templates.scene: playful setting like playground, beach, or home
templates.attire: playful casual family attire: family members wearing colorful or fun casual clothing, comfortable activewear, or playful outfits that match the joyful mood

templates.name: 坐姿全家福
templates.prompt: Family portrait with members seated on couch or chairs, comfortable and intimate arrangement
templates.scene: comfortable living room with nice furniture
templates.attire: comfortable family attire: family members wearing coordinated but comfortable clothing suitable for seating, soft fabrics, relaxed formal or smart casual outfits

templates.name: 专业摄影棚全家福
templates.prompt: Professional studio family portrait, perfect lighting, formal attire, professional photography quality
templates.scene: professional photography studio with professional backdrop
templates.attire: coordinated formal studio attire: family members wearing matching or complementary formal outfits, suits, dresses, or elegant studio photography attire

templates.name: 节日家庭照
templates.prompt: Family photo for holidays or special occasions, festive atmosphere, seasonal decorations or attire
templates.scene: holiday decorated home or festive setting
templates.attire: festive holiday attire: family members wearing holiday-appropriate or festive clothing, seasonal colors, celebratory outfits that match the holiday theme

arrangements.name: 全员站立

arrangements.prompt: Some family members seated (usually older generations or parents), others standing behind or beside

arrangements.name: 前后排列
arrangements.prompt: Family members arranged in two rows, some in front and some behind, all visible

arrangements.name: 半圆排列
arrangements.prompt: Family members arranged in a semi-circle or curve facing the camera
